source.sqlReaderQuery: select customerid,addressid, c.rowguid crow, a.rowguid arow from saleslt.customer c join saleslt.address a on c.rowguid!=a.rowguid

properties.description: Create a pipeline name 'Ingestion_Product_To_JSON' which will copy all the product records as JSON only if total number of records >10.

Create a pipeline name 'Ingestion_Product_Addres_To_JSON' which will copy all the product records as JSON only if total number of records >10. After that check total record count in address table if they are greater than 100 then copy the adress table data as CSV in ADLS.
copy cust data from db table to adls
Linked service to connect to azure sql db to access customer data
